name: 19 cards + saffira
author: Silver Stone
notes:
I summoned Saffira very few times and only if I go first (too many times in this ranked season). Im not sure about the fact that Balance includes the topdeck card, cause 2 times I get 2 rituals and 2 ritual spells and the 5th card was another ritual spell......
Also, very solid and for sure better than mind scan brick stuffs. 
PS: Bacon Savior very OP lol
